Tavatron watched Dinobot leave. She settled back against the cave wall and 
sighed. *I wonder how thing's are back at the base.* Tavatron stared at the 
bubbling lava.

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Wed, 19 Apr 2000 18:08:10 PDT
>
>
>* Dinobot looked at the interior of the cave as he walked in, there were
>small holes in the roof that let enough light in to cast pools of silver
>haze onto the floor. There was a small lava pool to the left and it gave 
>off
>enough heat to bite back the morning chill.
>He walked towards the right and stopped when he was fare enough from the
>lava to be comfortable, he then bent and set Tavatron onto the ground as
>carefully as he could. There was no telling how damaged her repair mode
>would get if he would have just dropped her.
>Dinobot straightened up and looked back towards to mouth of the cave,
>Tavatron would be safe here until he returned with breakfast.*
>
>" I do not have anything edible at hand, however, I am leaving to hunt. You
>shall be safe here until my return."
>
>* It was then that Dinobot turned and walked towards the cave mouth, he
>wouldn't be long and he would try and bring back a fare sized catch.
>Once outside he transformed into his Beast Mode and stalked off into the
>surrounding trees.                                             The morning
>was young and a predator's stomach growled!*
>
>
>
>
